clientsort.name: 用戶端排序
message.clientsort.installCloth: 安裝 Cloth Config API 以調整模組選項。
option.clientsort.interactionRate.toolti: 降低以更快排序，如果遇到封包速率問題則提高
option.clientsort.lmbBundle.tooltip: In 1.21.2+, bundles use right-click to load and unload, which breaks sorting. If playing on a 1.21.2+ server, enable this option.
option.clientsort.soundMinPitch.tooltip: Initial pitch of the sorting sound
option.clientsort.soundMaxPitch.tooltip: Final pitch of the sorting sound
option.clientsort.soundAllowOverlap.tool: Whether to allow the previous sound to continue when starting a new sound
hotbarMode.clientsort.merge.tooltip: 快捷欄將視為主物品欄的一部分
hotbarMode.clientsort.split.tooltip: 快捷欄將視為不同的物品欄
extraSlotMode.clientsort.none.tooltip: Extra slots will not be sortable
extraSlotMode.clientsort.hotbar.tooltip: Extra slots will be sorted with the hotbar
extraSlotMode.clientsort.inventory.toolt: Extra slots will be sorted with the main inventory
